rComments: Jessamyn was amazing! If you ave a chance to take her class definitely do it! If you do your work you'll pass the class. She is very loving and is very easy to talk to. If you have a question don't hesitate to ask her. She always brightened my day when I went to her class!

Professor Schertz is great! Her explanations are very clear and she provides good analogies to get across more abstract concepts. She went over things several times when she noticed it wasn't getting through to the class, and she was very helpful in her office hours if there were any questions remaining.

She was an amazing professor. I learned a lot in her class. I had to miss the midterm but she was very understanding and allowed me to make it up. She was also very super sweet. The content of the class was very easy to understand as long as you went to lecture and did readings. If you have an opportunity to take one of her classes you should!

The exam was the hardest part of the whole course and even it wasn't that bad. Prof. Schertz does have a tendency to fly through the lecture material, so I highly suggest a laptop for notetaking -I tried handwriting to no avail. You HAVE to do the homework and practice to do well in this course. Without practice, the material is hard to understand.

Very engaging professor, gives some in-lecture practice, teaches really well. She might inspire you to get into linguistics with how interesting she makes things sound. Prior to tests/quizzes, she tells you exactly what's going to be on them.
The best! She's so sweet and really cares about students. As long as you paid attention in class you were good to go. Textbook isn't necessary but it can help clear up some concepts.
